public class TextArea
extends Input

An input control for getting larger text input.

Author:
mtazari

Constructor Detail

TextArea

public TextArea()
For exclusive use of de-serializers.

TextArea

public TextArea(Group parent,
                Label label,
                PropertyPath ref,
                Restriction valueRestriction,
                String initialValue)
For exclusive use of applications.

Parameters:
parent - The mandatory parent group as the direct container of this text area. See FormControl.PROP_PARENT_CONTROL.
label - The optional Label to be associated with this text area. See FormControl.PROP_CONTROL_LABEL.
ref - See FormControl.PROP_REFERENCED_PPATH; mandatory.
valueRestriction - See FormControl.PROP_VALUE_RESTRICTION; optional.
initialValue - The optional initial value to be stored in form data under the path given for the above ref parameter.
Method Detail

getMaxLength

public int getMaxLength()
Overrides the default implementation as a text area normally has no upper limit on number of characters.

Overrides:
getMaxLength in class FormControl

getTypeURI

public String getTypeURI()
Overrides the default implementation by constantly returning xsd:string.

Overrides:
getTypeURI in class FormControl

storeUserInput

public boolean storeUserInput(Object value)
Overrides the default implementation to accept only strings.

Overrides:
storeUserInput in class Input
